description: Details required by condition 5 (Sustainable Drainage Systems (SuDS)) of planning permission 19/05867(Proposed lower ground floor rear extension with roof terrace incorporating 1.8m high timber screening trellis on either side and new external steps leading from the roof terrace to the rear enlarged patio area. Replacement of window frames including single glazed windows with double glazed windows in the front and rear elevations. Lowering of rear garden area including introduction of hardstanding paving and landscaping. Introduction of steps in the bottom of the rear garden area. Replacement of roof and introduction of new storage space at lower ground floor in the front. Replacement of pillars on either side of the front entrance gate.Works to the front steps and associated internal alterations). (Consultation not yet commenced)
